Identity.History: In tombs such as these, warriors from many cultures are be buried to honor their life's deeds. Breaking the peace of a sepulcrum is considered shameful. Raising its occupants as undead and binding them to one's service iss an unforgivable insult to a culture and its people.
Identity.Tooltip: Allows the raising of warrior Stalfos forms, as well as upgrades for them.
